DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect fluoxetine orally dissolve tablet ( ODT ) repetitive behavior core domain child adolescents Autistic Disorder . The study also investigate effect fluoxetine improvement symptom effect daily live patient 's family .
DOC.criteria: Meets DSMIV criterion autistic disorder , . CYBOCSPDD score least 10 screen . Diagnosis Asperger Syndrome Pervasive Developmental Disorder Not Otherwise Specified , Rett Syndrome , Childhood Disintegrative Disorder . Patients plan commence cognitive behaviour therapy period study begin cognitive behaviour therapy within 8 week prior enrolment . Patients currently take fluoxetine previously take eligible study . Other protocoldefined Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
